app.name: Smart Hire
app.description: Revolutionizing the hiring process with AI-powered candidate matching
features.smartMatching.title: Smart Matching
features.smartMatching.description: AI-powered candidate matching based on job requirements and company culture
features.aiInsights.title: AI Insights
features.aiInsights.description: Get detailed insights and recommendations for each candidate
features.streamlinedProcess.title: Streamlined Process
features.streamlinedProcess.description: Automate and optimize your hiring workflow for better efficiency
about.mission.title: Our Mission
about.mission.description: At Smart Hire, we're revolutionizing the hiring process by leveraging the power of artificial intelligence. Our mission is to make hiring more efficient, fair, and effective for both employers and job seekers.
about.vision.title: Our Vision
about.vision.description: We envision a future where AI-powered tools help create better matches between companies and candidates, leading to more successful and fulfilling careers.
about.team.title: Our Team
about.team.description: Our team consists of experts in AI, HR, and software development, working together to create innovative solutions for modern hiring challenges.
